modName: Daylight Ring - Sunlight Protection for Vampires
summary: Negate the effects brought on by the Sun by wearing this ring. No longer will Vampire's be weakened by the Sun!
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply adds a ring to the world of Skyrim that when worn completely counteracts the negative effects of sunlight on Vampires. Regeneration will be back to normal as will your Health, Magicka and Stamina points.

You can find this ring the Hall of the Dead catacombs in Whiterun, on a table that depending on if you kill someone will have a coffin. The pictures above show where to find it.

Alternatively if you cannot find the ring in the world, simply type into console: help "Daylight Ring"
You will then get the ID code so you can add the item to your inventory manually.

At the moment, the effect and text that notifies you of being in sunlight is still in place. I am working on removing it when the ring is worn.
author: Liam0102
